attributes.action: MPS should vote in accordance with their election mandates or abstain.
attributes.background: The EU referendum was , Remain or Leave.  80% 0f parties stood on manifestos that agreed to respect the 2016 result,' To Leave the EU' .Parliament confirmed this by enacting Article 50.Those MPs who cannot support the will of the people after giving them the responsibility should abstain or resign.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
